text:
Recombix | SENIOR JAVASCRIPT DEVELOPER | Moorgate, London, UK | ONSITE | www.recombix.com

We need an intelligent, experienced Senior Full-Stack JavaScript developer who can lead a team to build robust software to a very high standard.

Recombix is a young, energetic and fast-growing tech startup working on solving tough technical problems using cutting-edge tech. We pride ourselves on the high quality of our work and our clients love us for it.

React/Vue/Node/Mongo/PostgreSQL/GraphQL/REST/CI/SASS/Serverless
